title: How to get the current offset use IDC or IDAPython?
content: When writing an IDA script, how to use IDC or IDAPython to get the file offset for a memory address?

answers_data.content:
offset = idaapi.get_fileregion_offset(ea)
ea = idaapi.get_fileregion_ea(offset)
ref:How to extract the input file offset of a byte in idapython?
